Subject: When starting a fire you end up with a lot of smoke in the house until the fire gets really hot.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
When starting a fire you end up with a lot of smoke in the house until the fire gets really hot.
TITLE: 
white river fishing
REVIEW: 
Always a great stay, however, it does need a few updates. Two years in a row the heat was an issue. The manager/owner fixed it, but, it was something we had to deal with. One side of the stove is not working and the other side worked half the time. Hard to bake if the oven won't stay on and the kitchen is part of the reason we stay at this house. The kitchen needs a good cleaning. With a professional stove you deal with a lot of grease and the area around the stove and the vent area needs attention. We had to fix a few chairs that had loose legs when we got there and one of the chairs at the dining room table is broken. The grill on the back porch also needs a good cleaning. When grilling or smoking it ends up firing up because of all the old grease left on it and it has a few broken parts. The last thing is the wood burning fire place, the chimney probably needs a clean out. When starting a fire you end up with a lot of smoke in the house until the fire gets really hot.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: The fire alarm in the living room was beeping for our visit and was far to high to replace, which was unfortunate.
Description:

Our large group had a great time at this home. We played corn hole, went in the hot tub, made a fire and played games. The fire alarm in the living room was beeping for our visit and was far to high to replace, which was unfortunate. Otherwise everything was as advertised and we enjoyed our stay.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Fire wood, toys, games and knives that actually cut, snow was scarce and ice was unsafe but all the extras were enough to accommodate and entertain all age groups.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Fire wood, toys, games and knives that actually cut, snow was scarce and ice was unsafe but all the extras were enough to accommodate and entertain all age groups.
TITLE: 
northern xmas party
REVIEW: 
We rent several times a year at various properties. In recent years you can start to feel the "blah" of corporate or large rental groups that is reflected in their properties. It was nice to stay at a home not just a house this time, it had thought-out amenities that make a home, it had things you didn't know you needed, until you needed them. It is risky, costly and I imagine a pain to maintain these offerings, we should all be thankful and respectful because these properties and hospitality are becoming rare. I was surprised and a little confused when the actual home owner reached out to me, an actual person, not a generated text or rental service employee. He spoke like we were old friends, which was the confusing part at first but once that was sorted out we had a great introductory conversation. Fire wood, toys, games and knives that actually cut, snow was scarce and ice was unsafe but all the extras were enough to accommodate and entertain all age groups. Thank you again -RJS
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Could not see a fire alarm and the oven kept tripping the fuse box/power off when used.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Could not see a fire alarm and the oven kept tripping the fuse box/power off when used.
TITLE: 
island shack
REVIEW: 
The good - easy to get to and check in. Lots of bedding options, towels and linen. Enjoyed the family games and staples in the pantry. Not so good - the wonderful view was blocked by vehicles parked out front, the double bed was quite uncomfortable, some TLC is needed in the property with fittings (broken and uncovered light sockets/exposed wiring) and some items fell/broke due to poor attachments to plaster (owner repaired when contacted). Couldn't see a fire alarm and the oven kept tripping the fuse box/power off when used. The owner was easy to contact on Stayz and while not living nearby, had a neighbour who was available if needed. Instructions for the use of the appliances would have been helpful, also some fishing rods or beach gear that we might borrow. Was overpriced for a shack but overall a fairly pleasant stay.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: outlets are starting to become a fire hazard
Description:
SENTENCE: 
outlets are starting to become a fire hazard
TITLE: 
needs a good deep cleaning

This property is about 10 minutes to the beach which is very convenient. The condo itself is dingy, dirty, and very outdated. The walls are scuffed up, outlets are starting to become a fire hazard, and there was hair in the tub from previous renters.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: While the property itself has many good features, presents nicely and the property managers responded quickly to problems as they arose, we were confronted with a number of concerning issues which we spent valuable holiday time dealing with quite apa
Description:
SENTENCE: 
While the property itself has many good features, presents nicely and the property managers responded quickly to problems as they arose, we were confronted with a number of concerning issues which we spent valuable holiday time dealing with quite apart from the total inconvenience of the maintenance failures eg the dishwasher failed on the first usage & leaked into the downstairs (dishwasher hose & associated electrics- rodent damage), 3 beds at least did not have fresh sheets and had sand etc in them (too late at night to involve property managers), batteries to 2 fans needed replacing and fire alarm battery needed replacing after dishwasher leak.
TITLE: 
a holiday home with potential (with more attention to maintenance).
REVIEW: 
We recently rented this property for a family of 7. While the property itself has many good features, presents nicely and the property managers responded quickly to problems as they arose, we were confronted with a number of concerning issues which we spent valuable holiday time dealing with quite apart from the total inconvenience of the maintenance failures eg the dishwasher failed on the first usage & leaked into the downstairs (dishwasher hose & associated electrics- rodent damage), 3 beds at least did not have fresh sheets and had sand etc in them (too late at night to involve property managers), batteries to 2 fans needed replacing and fire alarm battery needed replacing after dishwasher leak. The one upstairs toilet had a very unpleasant & obvious smell. The downstairs ensuite accommodation (a room off the converted garage) does not have an opening window in the bedroom or a fan, the nearby kitchenette could at least provided glasses for water- it is totally empty of any utensils. Not really a pleasant alternative space for grandparents!
Brand: VRBO

Subject: The fire alarm was almost out of batteries as it beeped occasionally, which is not very safe.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The fire alarm was almost out of batteries as it beeped occasionally, which is not very safe.
TITLE: 
our stay
REVIEW: 
Door was jammed when we first arrived. Had to try for at least 20 minutes before we got in the house. Luckily, the host answered relatively fast. The fire alarm was almost out of batteries as it beeped occasionally, which isn‚Äôt very safe. The steps going into the basement were extremely steep, we had a few minor accidents. Living room was spacious and clean. The bedrooms were nice too. Before booking we asked the host if the hot tub was accessible and they said yes, it was not. No water and not ready to be used. We tried filling it up the next morning with the help of one of the neighbors, he told us there might be a leak since water wouldn‚Äôt stay. Our overall stay was okay, just some minor house issues that they should maybe look into.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: #1 Fire Alarm was removed from the wall and Beeping/Chirping when we put it back in.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
#1 Fire Alarm was removed from the wall and Beeping/Chirping when we put it back in.
TITLE: 
keep looking -beeping fire alarm & construction, dated
REVIEW: 
The owner was nice enough to allow us to checkin early & out later, however upon checkin there were issues that we brought to his attention that were not addressed. #1 Fire Alarm was removed from the wall and Beeping/Chirping when we put it back in. We didn‚Äôt feel safe leaving it off, so our relaxing beach getaway turned into a headache and the owner never came to fix it like he said he would. #2 Prior to arriving, I asked if there were any issues we should know about that would cause us grief. He said no. However, the beach was closed off and active construction vehicles were up and down the beach beeping and grunting. Ugh #3 for the moments between the alarm chirping and the construction vehicles beeping, even if they were silent, the beach sounds are obstructed by the loud busy road. #4 The unit is clean but it is dated. Don‚Äôt expect luxury. Everything is pretty basic and standard, including the linens & mattresses, and pretty worn down. #5 Bunk bed mattresses are pretty much low quality 4-5‚Äù foam pads not really mattresses #6 the old refrigerator is also LOUD #7 The pool area is nice. At almost three Benjamins for one night, I‚Äôd keep looking for a better spot.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: There was a plentiful supply of wood for the fire which we enjoyed.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
There was a plentiful supply of wood for the fire which we enjoyed.
TITLE: 
a comfortable beach house and place to escape and chill
REVIEW: 
It's a classic beach house - light, airy, casual & comfortable with minor imperfections that don't get in the way of having a great time. It is clearly used regularly based on the inventory of conveniences like condiments. There was a plentiful supply of wood for the fire which we enjoyed. We also enjoyed the Jacuzzi on cool mornings and evenings. We cooked a 6-course BD dinner for 8 in a well-equipped kitchen. Given that the enclave is locked, we felt safe and secure. The beach is close enough for a short sunrise viewing, short dog walks and longer stays for beachcombing. The one surprise we need to mention is that a dog can escape the property from the back yard though not from the front yard. He only escaped once and all was well. We had a great time!
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Sometimes the smoke alarm went off for no reason and we noticed this thanks to the webcam that we left inside the apartment and this has caused us problems a few times.

Subject: The smoke detector was chirping when we arrived but was tended to before nightfall.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The smoke detector was chirping when we arrived but was tended to before nightfall.
TITLE: 
just okay
REVIEW: 
Property is well located in Greenway Plaza area on Richmond. But it is a large apartment bldg. So there are many access points. It‚Äôs cumbersome to use the app while trying to bring items in and figuring out which entrance to use. A detailed map with preferred parking area would be useful. Entrance D on 3rd floor looked to be most manageable with available spots. 

The unit itself was ok but in need of maintenance. The smoke detector was chirping when we arrived but was tended to before nightfall. But primary bath was not very clean. Hair and dirty cotton balls were on the floor. Caulking around tub was gross. Secondary bathtub was peeling and did not drain properly. Kitchen needed additional trash bags. Linens for beds and towels were all thin and not high quality. Could be a really great rental with some TLC.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: We had a problem with a smoke alarm going off randomly
Description:
SENTENCE: 
We had a problem with a smoke alarm going off randomly
TITLE: 
you get what you pay for
REVIEW: 
First, this property is NOT a resort as listed. It is a nice gated community that is pretty quiet (we had one problem neighbor who wanted to stand outside and talk loud under the master bedroom window until about midnight) with a great resort-style pool. The condo itself was clean, but tired. It really needs much TLC. The sofa was hard to sit on, the cushions just sink into the frame as it is a pull out. Also, the owner was very nice and responsive, but cannot say the same for her property management company. We had a problem with a smoke alarm going off randomly and she had to resort to calling the HOA President, Andy, who came over on a Friday night to change the batteries in all the alarms. Evergreen, the Property Mgmt Co was supposed to have come over the day before, but didn't return phone calls on Friday when the problem persisted. Again, you get what you pay for so this isn't a complaint, just so anyone in the future will know before you go!
Brand: VRBO

Overall it was a nice space to stay

Subject: The stairs are too dark and not easy to negotiate.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The stairs are too dark and not easy to negotiate.
TITLE: 
great location -- not a comfortable stay
REVIEW: 
I'll start with the positive: the house is a great location. We went to ski @ Sugarbush and could not have been better. It recently snowed and the driveway was well plowed. The house had great hot water. Plenty of it. 

The challenges: the house has next to no privacy - bathrooms included. Even for adults the house has several safety issues. The stairs are too dark and not easy to negotiate. The kitchen was dirty, poorly stocked. No cold water at the kitchen sink. The fireplace could not be used. A ski house with a fireplace but you are told not to use it! The two doors on the first level to the outside cannot be locked! As a result it did not feel safe. 
The house had a persistent bad smell. There were several trash bags sitting outside the front door. I contacted the management co about this and the smell. The trash was picked up; but I did read in reviews that this has happened before. No one from the management co got back to me about the smell despite the fact that I told them that it may be a minor gas leak! 

The net is I would not stay here again.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: We had to shovel the driveway to get the truck in (we have 4x4) and we had to shovel the stairs and walk to the door which was very steep and slippery.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
We had to shovel the driveway to get the truck in (we have 4x4) and we had to shovel the stairs and walk to the door which was very steep and slippery.
TITLE: 
perfect location
REVIEW: 
Overall it was a great experience. The line for Northstar when driving from the property was very short. If you come from the other direction you wait for hours. It has plenty of room and things to do for the kids, area to play, games, pool table etc. the fireplace is nice and warms the house up. For the most part we had everything we needed. A few things that could have been better, these are small things and just would have been nice. There were no paper towels, there were not enough towels for the hot tub (only 2). The sheets on the master bedroom bed are probably from 1990 and were worn out in 1995. They don‚Äôt stay on the bed even for a minute. There are extra pillows but no pillow cases anywhere. My husband hated the bed but I was fine. DO NOT bring anyone who may slip easily or who has trouble walking in the winter. We had to shovel the driveway to get the truck in (we have 4x4) and we had to shovel the stairs and walk to the door which was very steep and slippery. The trash cans in the bear box was overflowing so we couldn‚Äôt take our trash out. The back bedroom was freezing at night but we had plenty of blankets that we brought from home.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Access to the property was struggling through overgrown roses bushes and a narrow path with steep concrete steps and no hand rail.

The premises are a converted basement, cobwebs were very visible and there was a dried up cucumber left in the fridge. The bed looked as though someone had sat on it, quite saggy looking. We left the premises and booked in elsewhere and had a wonderful time in Wellington.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.
Description:
SENTENCE:

TITLE: 
inviting place with a great view
REVIEW: 
This cozy townhome was perfect for our weekend at Beech Mountain. It was a close (less than 5 min) drive to the mountain, easy to access, and had everything we needed to cook all of our meals. The view is absolutely incredible and it was nice to just curl up by the fireplace and take in the view. I have reduced my rating by 1 star because the interior stairs of this home are quite steep. The height of the risers were higher than your average staircase and although there is a handrail, it is also higher than normal taking more effort to reach for. As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection.
TITLE: 
gas leaks through out the property that were not fixed
REVIEW: 
We stayed in this rental January 20-23. We left a night early due to four natural gas leaks through out the property. We had to call Xcel which said the fireplace needed to be shut off immediately and fixed. One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection. The management company said it was safe to stay in the property. They turned off the fireplace but did not address anything else. We had to call them. Not one of them called to see how we were or if they could help. And when we asked to leave a night early because we did not feel safe, they gave us a hard time because they insisted it was safe. They did not fix the leaks on the main floor which is where the bunk room is where all the kids were sleeping. We did not feel comfortable or safe staying. I called several days later to follow up and the leaks had not been fixed. The management company laughed when I expressed my frustration at the lack of concern. Would not recommend a management company that is in the business of booking a house that is unsafe. One of the maintenance guys that came while Xcel was inspecting said the property had received the same complaint and nothing was done.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Speaking of stairs, I understand it may not rain a lot in LA but it did when I was visiting and the most dangerous thing is wet wood as steps with no grip, they became dangerously slippery with how steep the steps are.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Speaking of stairs, I understand it may not rain a lot in LA but it did when I was visiting and the most dangerous thing is wet wood as steps with no grip, they became dangerously slippery with how steep the steps are.
TITLE: 
not as advertised
REVIEW: 
The Bad : The first thing is either add a window or list this as what it is a Basement. Secondly if you expect the noise ordinance to be upheld by the renters then the owners should as well. There is no reason I should be woken up bulg what I can assume only to be as a morning ballet lesson followed by a fashion runway in cement heels. Next the bathroom while it is gorgeous definitely need to be looked at. The sink is entirely to small and there is a strange sewer smell that lingers in the bathroom. The internet was great on my devices but the TV is so old that it can't keep up with the wifi so watching anything that was streamed constantly buffered or flat out got stuck loading. Speaking of the TV half of the TV is darkened and will SOON be out. Next the lighting going down to the property is also dangerous there needs to be more closer to the door. The bamboo on steps needs to be trimmed back, I should not have to walk around it to use the stairs. Speaking of stairs, I understand it may not rain a lot in LA but it did when I was visiting and the most dangerous thing is wet wood as steps with no grip, they became dangerously slippery with how steep the steps are. Lastly a trash can NEEDS to be added, yes I know you have the tiny trash can big enough for receipts below the sink but that's clearly not enough.

The Good : very beautiful neighborhoods. The furniture in the room was all very well crafted and clean. The studio itself was also very clean. The lighting in the apartment was very nice. The bathroom was very nice for a one person as well. Accessibility to the neighborhood were very easy and great for finding food and other things.

My grade would be. 2.5/5
Brand: VRBO

Subject: we recommend slides or slippers for the stairs as the no-fall configuration of them hurts your feet until your used to them
Description:
SENTENCE: 
we recommend slides or slippers for the stairs as the no-fall configuration of them hurts your feet until your used to them
TITLE: 
great homebase!
REVIEW: 
This great retreat was central to all we wanted to do: PhD graduation, visiting family, swimming with manatees, St. Augustine, and DWorld. If you want to just visit all the amusement areas this house would be perfect - we went 1 day and came home for naps, lunch, and a swim before we headed back - it took us about 15min maybe less.

Main room is downstairs, we recommend slides or slippers for the stairs as the no-fall configuration of them hurts your feet until your used to them. We weren't used to glass tables and were happy to find, and use placemats! 

Doordashing was our dinner go too - so many great places around. Food was always hot - we did have a full fridge which was great.

Swimming and hottubing every day next to a lake was heavenly!! Worth the extra fee for sure.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: There are two steps easily seen from the kitchen down to a door leading outside, but then there is another step beyond that which we all tripped down (it is all black tile) so be careful of that.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
There are two steps easily seen from the kitchen down to a door leading outside, but then there is another step beyond that which we all tripped down (it is all black tile) so be careful of that.
TITLE: 
great beach location
REVIEW: 
Our family of 5 recently stayed at this home (we have 3 older teens). The home decor was really unique and fun, and the outdoor space was great to relax in. The huge feature of this house was its proximity to the beach - just a 2 min walk and we had the beach to ourselves at times. Simply beautiful. The guest welcome guide online was great for getting us all the info we needed for check-in and check-out. Communication with the owners was extremely quick prior to our check-in, but once we arrived it slowed down. There were too many items to note for maintenance for me to give this 5 stars. The comforter in the Elton bedroom was stained/dirty, the fan ticked and a phone in the utility closet beeped every two minutes. We also had dust and dead flies under the chairs which we cleaned up. A kitchen drawer was missing the front panel and handle, and the dining room light fixture was missing a glass globe. The bunk room is quite small, as is the black/gold bathroom. There are two steps easily seen from the kitchen down to a door leading outside, but then there's another step beyond that which we all tripped down (it's all black tile) so be careful of that. The pool and hot tub were perfect. The showers in the two larger bathrooms were great. Beds need mattress pads (only a thin sheet between you and the mattress). But the vibe and location to the beach was top notch. I communicated the items that needed to be addressed and did receive an apology and a thanks so they can address for future guests. Unfortunately, it was enough to make the person in the Elton room uncomfortable for the entire stay. Bring bug spray (mosquitos are out). Hoping this home gets a little TLC for future guests.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Apart from this the cabin is not fit for small children as it does not have safe stairways and railings.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Apart from this the cabin is not fit for small children as it does not have safe stairways and railings.
TITLE: 
buyer beware
REVIEW: 
Buyer beware. 
look elsewhere for your vacation stay. I stayed in this property with my family for a Christmas vacation and it was nothing short of a disaster. The cabin had a faulty breaker and left us without heat for multiple days. The weather was 5 degrees and a wind chill of below 10 degrees. We had two small children and it was unsafe to stay in the cabin. When we were finally able to reach the property managers we were told to book additional lodging and that we would be reimbursed. After checking out they revoked their written word. Owners didn‚Äôt properly reimburse for the time the cabin was down nor did they reimburse for the additional lodging we needed. They didn‚Äôt take responsibly for the issues that needed to be fixed in order to have a safe and warm stay. We spent so much money, just to have our family separated and without answers on Christmas. I wouldn‚Äôt recommend staying in any property they own or manage (Kaizen property‚Äôs). Apart from this the cabin is not fit for small children as it does not have safe stairways and railings. Save your self a headache and book elsewhere. You won‚Äôt regret it.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Bathroom is up a step and then toilet is up another step down stairs so that is no good for in the dark walking to the bathroom.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Bathroom is up a step and then toilet is up another step down stairs so that is no good for in the dark walking to the bathroom.
TITLE: 
worst rental experience yet- but comfy beds
REVIEW: 
I am a frequent VRBOer and this one was a first. I reached out via message and asked questions about the hot tub. Explained we were planning a ladies night out. My request said 5. Booking said max overnight 7. Shortly after arriving I received a message about ‚Äúno unregistered guest‚Äù. And ‚Äúno parties‚Äù I responded with it‚Äôs just a bunch of us ladies and I told you this is what we were reserving for. I said 2 more may stay and she then said well I have to charge you an additional $20. I mean I had been there an hour. Just trying to relax. All of us 33-50 year old moms!! We work in heath care! We needed to relax! I had to pay an additional $20
Which is just outrageous for the already $411 for the night. This woman does not know how to HOST and should not be a host. Also, the dust in the place was really bad in a ton of spots, the mold in the downstairs shower window was more than I could handle and the freaking hot tub! The reason we ended up with this one smelled terrible! Like mold. The 3 women who went in first came back smelling so bad we couldn‚Äôt take it. I have text messages about it the smell still the next day. Really nasty and she just responded with ‚Äúit was refilled 4 days ago and has chemicals‚Äù sure didn‚Äôt smell like any chemicals just musty mold! Even the placemats at the table smelled like mold. Bottom line is we picked this house after lots of looking because of the layout. The kitchen, the table and the living room blend together and it was nice for conversation. Pretty and comfortable. I loved the clock. The back porch was cool
With the fire and would be awesome in summer. If you plan to rent this for yourself in town for the night or maybe 2 sure anything else you should expect to be harassed for someone‚Äôs past mistakes. Oh and forced to buy the $79 insurance plan that she swears is coming back to
Me. But to me that should have been enough for
Her but no. She needs to stop hosting. I‚Äôll try and submit our messages screenshot for those who might think I‚Äôm over reacting ü§£. We had an awesome night after the hassle and the beds are really comfortable. The downstairs room is a little weird but nice and a huge washer dryer. Bathroom is up a step and then toilet is up another step down stairs so that‚Äôs no good for in the dark walking to the bathroom. Nightlights suggested. Please clean your hot tub. It is really really gross.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: If you arrive at night bring a flash light you have to go down a few stairs hard right then down about 4 or 5 more stairs and then walkway that that is very dark and thruthfully unsafe at night.

Subject: We had several people in our group slip down the stairs, one sliding all the way down causing extreme deep bruising on several parts of their body.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
We had several people in our group slip down the stairs, one sliding all the way down causing extreme deep bruising on several parts of their body.
TITLE: 
slippery steps
REVIEW: 
The space I would describe as a suite in a hotel room. All the amenities that you could need in the kitchen and bathroom are provided. The fireplace in the living room is very tall making it rather awkward watching tv however the size of the TV rather makes up for that. The only thing that I can say negative about the space is the only accessible door is up a flight of wood steps that are exposed to the weather, making them very slick early in the morning. We had several people in our group slip down the stairs, one sliding all the way down causing extreme deep bruising on several parts of their body. So be very careful during cold weather going up and down.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: On Saturday December 24,2022 my service animal fell down her stairs which are suspended hanging from ceiling with open wires.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
On Saturday December 24,2022 my service animal fell down her stairs which are suspended hanging from ceiling with open wires.
TITLE: 
worst property ever!!!
REVIEW: 
I am sending in proof of an unsafe and dangerous home we rented from VRBO. I have proof that we had issues from the day we arrived on December 23, 2022. We were supposed to stay until January 2nd 2023. We arrived to find the back door broken and the kitchen full of snow and ice. Because the back door is broken the thermostat will not properly heat the home. The heat is escaping through the door. We immediately contacted the owner and she said she would send someone out on Monday and had no one for the next 3 nights because of Christmas. A space heater was dropped off for us and never offered to clean up the kitchen full of snow and ice or make a temporary fix for us till Monday. She refunded us $100 for inconvenience which did not even cover one night of our stay as we froze all weekend with 1 space heater and 2 floors in the home. On Saturday December 24,2022 my service animal fell down her stairs which are suspended hanging from ceiling with open wires. I will include pictures so you can understand the stairs and exposed wires. He got a deep puncture wound and was bleeding everywhere. We rushed him to the hospital on Christmas Eve which is where we spent Christmas. We drove 1500 miles to see family and could not. Notified the owner of the dangerous steps and situation and she did not respond. On Monday December 26, 2022 the contractor was promised to come out and fix door. A heating and cooling guy came because he was told by owner there was a gas leak. She NEVER told us about that. He said the door is broken and no contractor can fix it it needs a new door. I called VRBO and her immediately and no response till Tuesday December 27, 2022. She said she thought there was a gas leak weeks ago and had it checked. I asked her why would you send a guy back to check after you rented the home to double check for a gas leak? You should double check before you rent the home. Or notify us that it is possible and let us make decision whether or not we want to risk staying at the home. Never offered anything for the dog or how dangerous the steps are either but made sure to mention she paid a lot of money to have the steps built. We also lost WiFi. We rebooted the system several times to no avail. Called spectrum and they said NO OUTAGE in area the home has been disabled for private account reasons and the owner needs to call in. She denied that also. Spectrum accidentally told us the reason. VRBO has not resolved the issue. VRBO refunded us 322 which is from the company. The guest pays VRBO when booking. They did this as a courtesy. The homeowner lied and said she gave it. I verified with VRBO that the $322 comes from VRBO and is their money NOT HERS. She is a slum landlord who fixed up a property half to make money. The house is awful!! It is on a slant. The bathroom door does not even stay shut. The front door is not fitted to frame and you can see 1 to 2 inches under door to outside. Putting pictures of Louis Vuitton frames to entice people. DO NOT RENT THIS HOME unless you plan on ruining your vacation. The owner is a FRAUD! No matter what she comments about this trust me it is a lie!! 

We had to be moved to a hotel mid vacation. VRBO did not support me even after providing detailed documentation and pictures of the home. My dog was injured and my family‚Äôs life was put in danger. I had to file a dispute with my bank in order to receive my money back. I will NEVER use VRBO and I am sharing this info on Facebook to warn my family and friends of this incident and the lack of help this company provided. This host is allowed to continue renting a property that is unsafe and not secure with no repercussions. I have notified the town in which this home is located of the issues and they informed me also that this home has no BUILDING PERMITS for any improvements so nothing has been approved for safety and security. Very disappointed in VRBO. WILL NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN 


FOLLOW UP! My bank did an investigation based on pictures and evidence I collected and they REIMBURSED me the money from this slum unsafe home THANK GOD!! 


RENTER BEWARE!!!!!
Brand: VRBO

Subject: There were numerous lights out in the very dark and steep exterior stairway, including the one over our door.
Description:

almost 5 star

Beautiful and large condo with a gorgeous location right on the beach. It was very clean, except for a hidden spill inside one of the cabinets from a previous guest. Pretty much everything you might need to cook with was there. A couple of shortcomings keep me from giving it a fifth star.

Brand: VRBO

Subject: The ‚Äúfloating stairs‚Äù in the house are aesthetically cool, but not safe for kids or dogs in my opinion.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The ‚Äúfloating stairs‚Äù in the house are aesthetically cool, but not safe for kids or dogs in my opinion.
TITLE: 
unique, art-infused townhouse in an amazing location but mind the stairs
REVIEW: 
My husband and I loved the Forsythe House. It‚Äôs very unique and not your typical beach rental. The space has a very cool vibe and we loved the views from the roof, over the park and the record player was also a great touch. There is lots of glass throughout so we didn‚Äôt love the fish bowl effect especially in the evening where people passing by can see everything (no curtains on the first floor). Seeing out to the view over the park was lovely. But people seeing right back in wasn‚Äôt my favorite. (I know, you can‚Äôt have it both ways). We also loved that it was pet friendly. No complaints about this house at all .. we‚Äôve already recommended it to some friends. However, if you have small kids or a small dog, I wouldn‚Äôt recommend it. The ‚Äúfloating stairs‚Äù in the house are aesthetically cool, but not safe for kids or dogs in my opinion. They aren‚Äôt just open at the riser, but they don‚Äôt have an attached railing with gaps of several inches between the tread and the wires they used for the railing. We had to carry our dog up and down. Just a small price to pay to reach the beautifully decorated bedrooms and amazing roof top deck. The roof top is another stellar feature and we enjoyed several sunsets up there but had to hold our dog in our lap or keep him on a short leash because the railings are very open. The location on Ruskin Square is stunning and we will 100% stay here again if we aren‚Äôt traveling with pets. Management was great and we really loved the location and the vibe.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Not that expensive or challenging to replace those fixtures with led fixtures Stairwell lights did not work and created an unsafe walkway.

Great location but the place needs an upgrade especially lighting and other items listed above.

Subject: Be careful going the stairs and hold the rail because my silly 30 year old behind fell down about 5 steps in slow motion but thank god I have good knees :) Book it y‚Äôall!!!
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Be careful going the stairs and hold the rail because my silly 30 year old behind fell down about 5 steps in slow motion but thank god I have good knees :) Book it y‚Äôall!!!
TITLE: 
staying at cedarwaxling
REVIEW: 
Our stay was beautiful short and sweet. We came in for a 1 night stay because I was visiting my sister in Hobby Unit Prison which is 40 min away.
2 hours before we checked in the property manager called me personally to let me know that the unit I originally wanted (The Starling) was having problems with electricity and that the lights were not working.
He gave me the choice of two of treehouses and I chose the CedarWaxling.
All and all I am happy with our stay despite moving cabins. 
It has everything you need , there is no oven but I did see two electrical hot plates under the sink so if you need something hot you can make a small breakfast or lunch.
Has microwave, plates, keirig with coffee pods, plates, glasses and mugs. 
They thought of everything.!!!
Be careful going the stairs and hold the rail because my silly 30 year old behind fell down about 5 steps in slow motion but thank god I have good knees :)
Book it y‚Äôall!!! You won‚Äôt regret it!
Have a beautiful year!
-Love Brie & Ryian
Brand: VRBO

Subject: I called manager to clear the ice dam that was blocking front door, which they refused to do even after I calling to tell them I fell and broke my ankle.
Description:
SENTENCE:

TITLE: 
don‚Äôt stay here!!
REVIEW: 
Wonderful view, TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. House is more than 120 yards from the parking lot‚Ä¶.it was not shoveled the entire time we stayed here. I called manager to clear the ice dam that was blocking front door, which they refused to do even after I calling to tell them I fell and broke my ankle. 
My husband ended up shoveling the walkway, three times. There is a terrible neighbor who yelled at us in the parking lot two days in a row. On our last day, he threatened to hit my husband with a ski pole. 
On top of the ice damn and no snow removal, the front deck was covered in dog poop. I asked the manager if they could clean it up, which they refused to do. We paid more than $10k for the time we rented this property, so hopefully you can understand our frustration. We will definitely NOT be back.

Subject: Downstairs shower needs an anti slip mat as my friend fell while showering and had to leave to seek medical attention on my 40th Birthday.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Downstairs shower needs an anti slip mat as my friend fell while showering and had to leave to seek medical attention on my 40th Birthday.
TITLE: 
gorgeous house but cleanliness and amenities of property were lacking
REVIEW: 
Mattresses were all hard as a rock. My back hurt after the first night. 1 TV in all of the house. No access to master closet so had to hang my clothes in one of the other rooms. The owner should at least provide a rolling rack. Extra pillows were stored under the bed on the floor. Found crumbs and pills in corner of floor in kitchen. Thank geez we didn't have infants or toddlers with us. I swept so much debris from under fridge and stove. Kitchen appliances are the cheapest of the cheap. Master bathroom lights and outlets went out 2 days into trip and I contacted Vacasa but they never responded. Downstairs shower needs an anti slip mat as my friend fell while showering and had to leave to seek medical attention on my 40th Birthday. Checkout time is 10am but cleaners were sitting outside the house before then causing me and my daughter to stress about having to pack up by ourselves since our friends had to leave. My friend found a booger on her comforter in the downstairs bedroom so not sure how often it is cleaned between guests. Spa needed to be filled with water but there were no instructions on how to do that. With heavy snow the entire trip the driveway wasn't plowed once and the street the house was on wasn't plowed on Sunday making it difficult to get to since the house is uphill. The house is gorgeous but we just had too many issues with our stay for the amount of money it cost. We were there to spend my 40th Birthday together and it ended on a bad note.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: The property was of a great location and simple walk to lake and town, however there are a few items we feel need addressing for future guests: The pedestal basin in the ensuite is very loose and the first night my wife leaned down on it when it move
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The property was of a great location and simple walk to lake and town, however there are a few items we feel need addressing for future guests: The pedestal basin in the ensuite is very loose and the first night my wife leaned down on it when it moved she fell over.
TITLE: 
feedback on property
REVIEW: 
The property was of a great location and simple walk to lake and town, however there are a few items we feel need addressing for future guests:
The pedestal basin in the ensuite is very loose and the first night my wife leaned down on it when it moved she fell over. Having no silicon seal is also a little unhygienic.
The tap in kitchen sink is very loose and you had to hold at the base when using it, again silicon seal not effective allowing water to splash under.
We only used the BBQ once as the tray in bottom with absorbent caught fire, i had gone into the kitchen and luckily my daughter saw the flames and i managed to extinguish. Definitely needs changing out.

All these are minor issues that could be easily fixed. Thanks for the use.

Subject: No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter had not been washed at all.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter had not been washed at all.
TITLE: 
disappointing
REVIEW: 
I hate leaving negative reviews but hopefully an honest review will help others considering this property. 

For starters, when we flipped one of the comforters around we found blood all over the backside. No one from our group had been bleeding and when we sprayed it with cleaner the blood turned orange like the comforter hadn't been washed at all. 

It doesn't seem like whoever runs this property has actually stayed here. The mattresses are all so uncomfortable my parents rented a separate place to stay in so they could get some sleep. There weren't enough towels for eight people. There wasn't enough room for our family (8 people) to sit together in the living room. Multiple outlets don't work. Neither of the coffee makers work.

My sister called the property management company and they brought more towels and a new coffee maker. However, they never responded to my message when I sent them a photo of the bloody comforter and listed other concerns. 

My family drove nine hours to stay here. It was $2k for three nights, in addition to the separate place my parents rented, and we all couldn't wait to leave. Not how you want to spend a family vacation. 

To end on a positive note: The cabin had a lot of space, the location is great and the hot tub was nice. They also sent a crew to clear the deck and stairs of snow.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: I fell and hurt my knee.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
I fell and hurt my knee.
TITLE: 
no heat
REVIEW: 
Ft Lauderdale had unseasonably cold weather the weekend we were there. 
The heater did not go on. Host informed us by email that a mechanic could not come and we had no choice but to leave 
that same evening. The house was freezing. We wore our winter coats the entire time I was trying to contact VRBO and the host 
The laundry room has an unmarked step down at the edge of the washer dryer. I fell and hurt my knee. I did not use the machines after that. The sliding doors are very old and difficult to open. The outdoor area had debris. All in all unpleasant experience. I am requesting a refund.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Graham Colyer drive has two public cut throughs which made the property super accessible to the beach and the shops on foot, skateboards or bikes
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Graham Colyer drive has two public cut throughs which made the property super accessible to the beach and the shops on foot, skateboards or bikes
TITLE: 
holiday winner
REVIEW: 
We had the best 3 nights here with 2 surfing families. The location is epic, Graham Colyer drive has two public cut throughs which made the property super accessible to the beach and the shops on foot, skateboards or bikes. It‚Äôs far enough out of the hub that it provides a relaxed and peaceful retreat to return to after a day at the main beach. We utilised the track through Sandcastle‚Äôs Resort to access the beach for early morning surfs. The house itself has a relaxed beach vibe and quirky charm. Unfortunately linen was not supplied which was the only down side. We took two dogs and unfortunately there are gaps under the front fences and our small dog got out one morning but was returned by a friendly local. We loved the front deck and spent most of our time at the house relaxing on it. Would absolutely book this house again.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: The sofas downstairs had several stains the arm rest on the sofa was broken
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The sofas downstairs had several stains the arm rest on the sofa was broken
TITLE: 
it was ok
REVIEW: 
Let me start with the communication with the property manger was awesome! He responded to all calls and emails. I am a travel agent and was disappointed with the property. The house is very spacious and could accommodate all ages. However I took pictures of the areas that were not appealing. The walls had stains on them throughout. There was a smell throughout the house that I had to go and purchase febreeze to try and remove. The sofas downstairs had several stains the arm rest on the sofa was broken and the smell on the sofas upstairs and downstairs was horrible. We went to the store and purchased bed sheets to lay on the sofas so that we could sit on them. The home needs new furniture, febreezed and walls repainted upstairs and downstairs.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: someone is going to sit down and injure themselves on those things!
Description:
SENTENCE: 
someone is going to sit down and injure themselves on those things!
TITLE: 
great location but poor unit
REVIEW: 
Cannot beat the location for ski in/ski out convenience and proximity to the village. But my positive points pretty much end there. All of the furniture and appliances in the unit are the absolute cheapest you can find in their categories. Beds were hard as rocks with lumpy, uneven pillows to match. Couch was also lumpy and uncomfortable. Several of the dining room chairs were legitimately about to fall apart, wobbling, or crooked; someone is going to sit down and injure themselves on those things! The microwave makes a terrible sound that is not confidence inspiring. The heat in the unit is odd, the bedrooms got very hot at night despite leaving the heaters off 100% of the time we were there. My only guess is heat from adjacent units makes them warm and no there is real way to cool them off short of opening a window in the freezing cold winter. I could go on, but those are the highlights. In short this unit cost WAAAAY too much money for there to be any excuse for the state that it was in. I paid over $600/night (after all the fees and taxes are added in) to get terrible sleep for 4 nights.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: This required me to go out and buy Styrofoam cups and plastic cups so that everyone could have something to drink at the same time, the ice machine was broken in the refrigerator so I had to buy ice and I had asked that every bathroom have at least o

christmas 2022 reunion
REVIEW: 
Overall, the house, location and property were OK. However, the kitchen was lacking in common kitchen utensils ‚Äì can opener, limited glasses, and limited, coffee, mugs, limited, serving bowls, no can opener, and no potato peeler although the house says it can seat 16 they was only seating for 12. It was only silverware for eight. There was only glasses and coffee mugs for eight. Subject: The springs in the large couch were broken/missing, so when you sat on it the frame of the couch dug into your legs.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The springs in the large couch were broken/missing, so when you sat on it the frame of the couch dug into your legs.
TITLE: 
just okay
REVIEW: 
All in all, this rental felt like someone hastily slapped together a cheap hotel room without actually testing anything out to make sure it was actually comfortable. If you're looking to rent somewhere that is comfortable enough to feel like someone‚Äôs vacation home, I strongly suggest looking elsewhere.

The location of this rental was decent; it was very close to the Disney parks, Walmart, and within walking distance to the pool in the complex. The rental was also very clean, and reasonably accurate to the pictures in the listing. That being said, the rental itself needs some major TLC. The floors and showers squeak loudly, and the tiles outside of the children's room upstairs are cracked and broken. The springs in the large couch were broken/missing, so when you sat on it the frame of the couch dug into your legs. The beds are all extremely uncomfortable/lumpy, and the linens did not fit the beds very well, so they would come off the mattresses while we slept. The beds were so bad that my mother and stepfather ended up taking turns sleeping on an air mattress because they could not both sleep in the bed on the first level at the same time. The AC was locked at 73, and the temperature in the rental varied wildly between being extremely hot and very cold. All of the curtains were sheer so it was very difficult to sleep in as light would start coming in as soon as the sun started to rise. 

Additionally, the neighborhood the rental is in is a pain in the butt to get into; the guard gate will require that you stop and hand over the license of the driver before they will let you in (even if you are using an uber). This often resulted in a long wait if multiple people who are renting try to come in. There was also very little consistency in the check in process at the gate; sometimes we were waved through without a second glance, other times they wanted to verify in the computer that we were allowed to enter and we were stuck waiting for several minutes. We mostly used Ubers and Lyfts, and the drivers were frequently stuck at the gate waiting despite me calling ahead and letting them know to expect them. One night my husband and I came back around 1 am after a date night, and the guard gate was unmanned despite us knocking and calling, so our uber could not get into the complex. We had to get out and walk around the gate to get home, which completely defeats the purpose of having a guard gate in the first place!
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Hope my host is ok, because it seemed like he fell off the face of the earth or maybe even passed away üò≥
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Hope my host is ok, because it seemed like he fell off the face of the earth or maybe even passed away üò≥
TITLE: 
do not book this property
REVIEW: 
I booked my stay a few months ago & the reviews were great. However, as my stay got closer I thought it was strange I hadn't heard from my host. I attempted to reach him through messaging on VRBO, texts & phone calls, but received no response. Then I saw the last 2 guests who booked the property were not able to access it. I contacted VRBO & they couldn't reach my host, either. It was 48 hours out and I still hadn't received access instructions. At that point, I booked a hotel. At 24 hours out, still nothing from my host. I called him & phone was disconnected. On my day of arrival I got a message saying my reservation had been canceled & I had been refunded. Glad I booked that hotel! Hope my host is ok, because it seemed like he fell off the face of the earth or maybe even passed away üò≥
Brand: VRBO

Subject: As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.
TITLE: 
inviting place with a great view
REVIEW: 
This cozy townhome was perfect for our weekend at Beech Mountain. It was a close (less than 5 min) drive to the mountain, easy to access, and had everything we needed to cook all of our meals. The view is absolutely incredible and it was nice to just curl up by the fireplace and take in the view. I have reduced my rating by 1 star because the interior stairs of this home are quite steep. The height of the risers were higher than your average staircase and although there is a handrail, it is also higher than normal taking more effort to reach for. As a mobile young adult, I personally slipped and fell down the stairs our first morning at the property and although I did not sustain any major injuries, it should be something future tenants are aware of when booking this property.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: I also sent through the pictures of my injuries after the fall and I just received a ‚Äòsorry about that and the ‚Äòbollard was put there by the neighbour so not really our problem‚Äô type of response - despite the bollard being on the pathway leading to t
Description:
SENTENCE: 
I also sent through the pictures of my injuries after the fall and I just received a ‚Äòsorry about that and the ‚Äòbollard was put there by the neighbour so not really our problem‚Äô type of response - despite the bollard being on the pathway leading to the door of the property.
TITLE: 
two night break
REVIEW: 
We booked a two night stay at this property at the beginning of January 2023. The house was lovely, nicely decorated, very clean and spacious. The location was great, we were practically in the grounds of the abbey and the views of Whitby were amazing. We had zero complaints about the inside of the property. 

I did have a fall on the pathway leading to the door of the property as a large stone bollard was placed across the pathway and as there was no outside lighting and the bollard was not highlighted in anyway the fell over it in the dark and suffered some nasty cuts and grazes, it was a shame is it happened within two hours of checking in so put a slight dampener on the break! So just be careful of that bollard if you stay. 

We were really keen to re-book this place and we even had a few friends that were interested after we showed them the pictures however we won‚Äôt book this place again due to the after contact with Home Stay who are the company that look after the property. 

I left a couple of things behind at the house and it took 4 emails and 2 phone calls over a period of two weeks to finally be told they didn‚Äôt have my items. Two items were left in the washing machine by mistake and they have claimed that nothing was handed in. I know full well that they were left so to tell me that house-keeping didn‚Äôt find anything was a blatant lie as well as being fobbed off for two weeks. The items weren‚Äôt super expensive but did cost me ¬£50.00 to replace, as one item was a equa-fleece dog all in one suit and a pair of bamboo socks. It was just so disappointing that they clearly have some very dishonest staff who would happily help themselves to guests property, whether that was keeping it themselves or disposing of it because they couldn‚Äôt be bothered to save it for me. 

I also sent through the pictures of my injuries after the fall and I just received a ‚Äòsorry about that and the ‚Äòbollard was put there by the neighbour so not really our problem‚Äô type of response - despite the bollard being on the pathway leading to the door of the property. 

Anyway, all I would say is, the house is lovely you will not be disappointed but just be very aware of the stone bollard and do not accidentally leave any items behind as you will not see them again.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: The bathroom hand sink stopper was broken so could not use that.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The bathroom hand sink stopper was broken so could not use that.
TITLE: 
the smell
REVIEW: 
I don‚Äôt know if it was a wet dog stayed before us but between that stench and cigarette smoke smell I would not stay here. The bathroom hand sink stopper was broken so couldn‚Äôt use that. Also only 2 half rolls of toilet paper were left so ran out of that. Have never had to go buy my own toilet paper for a weekend stay.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Please advise Penelope that we unfortunately broke a large and small glass and our son put his foot through one of the banana lounges on the front deck as he was getting up from it.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Please advise Penelope that we unfortunately broke a large and small glass and our son put his foot through one of the banana lounges on the front deck as he was getting up from it.
TITLE: 
mcmullen
REVIEW: 
A lovely property in a private but convenient location. We loved the modern design.The property was very well equipped e.g. appliances and cooking utensils unlike other holiday places we have stayed at.
We found the property very clean and comfortable to stay in.
Please advise Penelope that we unfortunately broke a large and small glass and our son put his foot through one of the banana lounges on the front deck as he was getting up from it.
Otherwise it was an enjoyable and incident free stay.
Please convey our thanks to Penelope for an enjoyable stay.
Tony and Gretel
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Head out on your skis and either continue on the green, stop for a drink at the Flume Shack or cut right and go down J Hook (our favorite blue).
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Head out on your skis and either continue on the green, stop for a drink at the Flume Shack or cut right and go down J Hook (our favorite blue).
TITLE: 
awesome location - truly ski in/out
REVIEW: 
The condo was great, very clean and well stocked, The location is amazing. Just a little ways down from the Soaring Eagle lift. The condo has an awesome ski room where all equipment can be stored and easily put on and taken off. Walk out the back door and you are on Upper Flume, a green run. You can either make your way down the bank or walk ~ 10 feet over to a staircase that is pretty easy to navigate. Head out on your skis and either continue on the green, stop for a drink at the Flume Shack or cut right and go down J Hook (our favorite blue). After skiing, it‚Äôs easy to ski right to the unit and get in the back door. At night, catch the bus right out the front door to Appalachia Kitchen (amazing food), Tuque‚Äôs (pizza!) or go a little further to the Village for mexican at Sunset Cantina (ask for Cassie!). Then come back and play your favorite game on the large and beautiful dining room table or jump in the hot tub (comfortable for 4 adults).
Brand: VRBO

Subject: One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection.
TITLE: 
gas leaks through out the property that were not fixed
REVIEW: 
We stayed in this rental January 20-23. We left a night early due to four natural gas leaks through out the property. We had to call Xcel which said the fireplace needed to be shut off immediately and fixed. One of the children staying in the house passed out and fell down the stairs due to the smell of the gas that is added to natural gas for detection. The management company said it was safe to stay in the property. They turned off the fireplace but did not address anything else. We had to call them. Not one of them called to see how we were or if they could help. And when we asked to leave a night early because we did not feel safe, they gave us a hard time because they insisted it was safe. They did not fix the leaks on the main floor which is where the bunk room is where all the kids were sleeping. We did not feel comfortable or safe staying. I called several days later to follow up and the leaks had not been fixed. The management company laughed when I expressed my frustration at the lack of concern. Would not recommend a management company that is in the business of booking a house that is unsafe. One of the maintenance guys that came while Xcel was inspecting said the property had received the same complaint and nothing was done.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: He got a deep puncture wound and was bleeding everywhere.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
He got a deep puncture wound and was bleeding everywhere.
TITLE: 
worst property ever!!!
REVIEW: 
I am sending in proof of an unsafe and dangerous home we rented from VRBO. I have proof that we had issues from the day we arrived on December 23, 2022. We were supposed to stay until January 2nd 2023. We arrived to find the back door broken and the kitchen full of snow and ice. Because the back door is broken the thermostat will not properly heat the home. The heat is escaping through the door. We immediately contacted the owner and she said she would send someone out on Monday and had no one for the next 3 nights because of Christmas. A space heater was dropped off for us and never offered to clean up the kitchen full of snow and ice or make a temporary fix for us till Monday. She refunded us $100 for inconvenience which did not even cover one night of our stay as we froze all weekend with 1 space heater and 2 floors in the home. On Saturday December 24,2022 my service animal fell down her stairs which are suspended hanging from ceiling with open wires. I will include pictures so you can understand the stairs and exposed wires. He got a deep puncture wound and was bleeding everywhere. We rushed him to the hospital on Christmas Eve which is where we spent Christmas. We drove 1500 miles to see family and could not. Notified the owner of the dangerous steps and situation and she did not respond. On Monday December 26, 2022 the contractor was promised to come out and fix door. A heating and cooling guy came because he was told by owner there was a gas leak. She NEVER told us about that. He said the door is broken and no contractor can fix it it needs a new door. I called VRBO and her immediately and no response till Tuesday December 27, 2022. She said she thought there was a gas leak weeks ago and had it checked. I asked her why would you send a guy back to check after you rented the home to double check for a gas leak? You should double check before you rent the home. Or notify us that it is possible and let us make decision whether or not we want to risk staying at the home. Never offered anything for the dog or how dangerous the steps are either but made sure to mention she paid a lot of money to have the steps built. We also lost WiFi. We rebooted the system several times to no avail. Called spectrum and they said NO OUTAGE in area the home has been disabled for private account reasons and the owner needs to call in. She denied that also. Spectrum accidentally told us the reason. VRBO has not resolved the issue. VRBO refunded us 322 which is from the company. The guest pays VRBO when booking. They did this as a courtesy. The homeowner lied and said she gave it. I verified with VRBO that the $322 comes from VRBO and is their money NOT HERS. She is a slum landlord who fixed up a property half to make money. The house is awful!! It is on a slant. The bathroom door does not even stay shut. The front door is not fitted to frame and you can see 1 to 2 inches under door to outside. Putting pictures of Louis Vuitton frames to entice people. DO NOT RENT THIS HOME unless you plan on ruining your vacation. The owner is a FRAUD! No matter what she comments about this trust me it is a lie!! 

We had to be moved to a hotel mid vacation. VRBO did not support me even after providing detailed documentation and pictures of the home. My dog was injured and my family‚Äôs life was put in danger. I had to file a dispute with my bank in order to receive my money back. I will NEVER use VRBO and I am sharing this info on Facebook to warn my family and friends of this incident and the lack of help this company provided. This host is allowed to continue renting a property that is unsafe and not secure with no repercussions. I have notified the town in which this home is located of the issues and they informed me also that this home has no BUILDING PERMITS for any improvements so nothing has been approved for safety and security. Very disappointed in VRBO. WILL NEVER USE THIS COMPANY AGAIN 


FOLLOW UP! My bank did an investigation based on pictures and evidence I collected and they REIMBURSED me the money from this slum unsafe home THANK GOD!! 


RENTER BEWARE!!!!!
Brand: VRBO

The other bedroom had a smell of feces and other smells. Both toilets were malfunctioning.
The windows would not open to let fresh air in to rid of smell, the doors could not stay open because of the alarm.
No anti-skid carpet, which caused some slip and falls. TV s didn‚Äôt work, scrambled images. Dark rooms.
I woke up to a flooded house during my stay around 1am. Fire Dept and police were called.
Advised to call the owner. Property manager was called and no help until 4am. I was advised this house was not habitable. After removing mattress, I noticed stain of feces and urine on mattress. It was gross and fowl odor explained.
Property manager called around noon and offered another house. All my clothes were soaked by the flooding. The worst thing was the nasty mattress we had to sleep in. very disrespectful!
This was truly a horrible vacation.
I need my deposit back and possibly some discount on this rent, or total money back!
I have pictures to verify my claims.
Sincerely;
Dissatisfied Nilce!

Subject: of course the pool is still broken, and drained except for about 1 foot of water at bottom, and no cover
Description:
SENTENCE: 
of course the pool is still broken, and drained except for about 1 foot of water at bottom, and no cover
TITLE: 
nice house, great location, beware of remax management company
REVIEW: 
Overall, This was a very well kept house and very convenient for our family. We booked this property because of location, amenities, and the pool. About 10 days prior to arrival I read a review that stated the pool was broke. I reached out to inquire and was told the owner has scheduled it to be fixed, with no date commitment. The previous renter was given a credit so I was not overly concerned. We show up and of course the pool is still broken, and drained except for about 1 foot of water at bottom, and no cover. Having small children with us made this dangerous and kept us from enjoying the lanai. When asked about the credit, Remax refused, and when I pushed back, received no response as to why. Also know that Remax will take a security deposit that is as much as a weeks rental and hold it for nearly two months. I did accept these terms, so caveat emptor. If you put this on a credit card, the interest can add up. I liked the property, but will never deal with a Remax managed property on VRBO again.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: (We had to beware with our kids) The pool was dirty, my kids did not even want to go in.
Description:

(We had to beware with our kids) The pool was dirty, my kids did not even want to go in.
TITLE: 
great location , old building and amenities
REVIEW: 
Irina the host is great, easy to communicate with, very helpful. But the disappointment was the place. The building is very old. Looks dirty. There was rat poison pieces all over the building main floor. (We had to beware with our kids) The pool was dirty, my kids didn‚Äôt even want to go in. (5-7y) We took that condo to have the pool has an option. The condo in on the Main floor, we did not expect that. The balcony is in the yard with high concrete walls with spikes at top and a lot of garbage of construction laying around everywhere. So we did not use the balcony. The bathroom needs a facelift , the bath looked dirty and lots of rust on the poles. (The sea salt would be doing that ) But the rest of the apartment was clean. The location is the highlight of this stay, right across the street, the beach is there , with the popular tiki bikini hut right there. We were able to walk everywhere with our kids. The center is a few minutes away and the fish fry we went many times , 10 min walk. Bahamian people are really nice. Nassau is a great place, we loved it !

Subject: The pool was dirty when we came but on Tuesday they did have the pool guy there and it was cleaned.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
The pool was dirty when we came but on Tuesday they did have the pool guy there and it was cleaned.
TITLE: 
older house
REVIEW: 
We had a party of 10 the fact that it had 5 bedrooms and all bedrooms had there own bath was awesome. 
The house needs some work:
Several blinds broken with this being the only window covering privacy can be a issue.
The last bedroom in the back of the house bed is terrible sunken in to the middle beds skirt ripped this bed needs replaced they tried just putting on a foam pad. The bathtub needs scrubbed you can scrape the sides and it's gross.
Loved having two washers and dryers they came in so handy with a large family who packed light.
Kitchen needs more frying pans other than that well equipped if you want to cook. 
Loved the grill we has a grill night.
The pool was dirty when we came but on Tuesday they did have the pool guy there and it was cleaned. 
The outdoor shower by the pool spigot is leaking.
The pool deck needs a lots of help and could be dangerous several broken pieces a few sticking up. 
We enjoyed the pool one day of our stay not very deep or big but was enjoyed üòÄ üëç.
Loved the outside table we all used this area often.
One of the chairs is broken on the inside table. Living room couch is a little dated. Loved that they had Netflix and Disney plus we had a two year old.
They had plenty of fans house does not have air-conditioning I was a bit worried but going in January the nights get a bit cooler days are hot but we we're gone most days. 
Lots of extra things in the closet off the living room some baby things toys, extra fans, each room has its own ceiling fan and had fans in the closet.
We loved all the extra thing like lawn chairs, umbrellas, ice chest, beach towels.
With a little bit of love this house could be brought back to life.
If you stay in the bedroom in the living room don't lock the door and the door to the bathroom no key was provided to us and we got locked out. Good thing it has a open space at the top üòâ. 
Overall we enjoyed our stay finding a house with a decent price range for bigger families is hard and we appreciate you offering your home to people.
Brand: VRBO

Subject: The hot tub did not get hot enough so we could not use it the upstairs bedroom had leaks so when it was raining all night it was constant dripping noises hitting the floor there was dead bugs on the windowsills and the washer machine was broke

mislead
REVIEW: 
The cabin was cute but could of been cleaner. The hot tub did not get hot enough so we could not use it the upstairs bedroom had leaks so when it was raining all night it was constant dripping noises hitting the floor there was dead bugs on the windowsills and the washer machine was broke
Brand: VRBO

Subject: Pool was filthy and yard equipment unusable.
Description:
SENTENCE: 
Pool was filthy and yard equipment unusable.
TITLE: 
disappointed
REVIEW: 
It was like they didn't know anyone was coming. Cabinets doorsin kitchen hanging off. Pool was filthy and yard equipment unusable. Deflated raft in corner of yard. Lounge chairs with big holes in them that you couldn't even sit in. 
Reached out to owner about all the issues and dinner and knowledge any of them except for the pool being dirty. Said he sends somebody out the next day, but didn't say that it would be a 5:00 a.m. in the morning. Woke up and barely had a heart attack because somebody was in the yard and it looked like they were trying to break in.
Brand: VRBO
